Donations

Free Geek is a 501(c)(3) nonprofit, so you know that your donations go right back to the community!

Access to information has become a basic need in the 21st century. Without it, a person is at serious disadvantage competing for livable-wage jobs. Your donation helps thousands of Free Geek volunteers get computer technology into the hands of people who need it including the disadvantaged, schools, non-profits, and other community change organizations. Donations also help pay for free classes, tech support, and volunteer programs to ensure that everyone in the greater Portland community has access to a strong base of computer user skills.

Contribute by Mail

If you’d prefer to contribute by mail, please print this form, complete it and send to:

Free Geek
1731 SE 10th Avenue
Portland, OR 97214

Contribute Online

Because most of Free Geek’s labor is done by volunteers even small donations can get quite a bit of technology and education to someone who needs it. Your cash and equipment donations are eligible as tax-deductions. We provide tax receipts for all allowable deductions. Donate online through Paypal:

Include Free Geek in your estate plan

Please consider including Free Geek in your will or trust to help one of your favorite non-profits continue doing amazing things for our community.

Thank you for supporting Free Geek’s mission!
